common_issues.title: Pieces OS 11.4.2: Various Bugs Reported
common_issues.description: Users report issues with Pieces OS 11.4.2, including Chrome plugin connection failures (plugin version 4.0.9), desktop app crashes on macOS when L.T.M 2.5 is enabled, and image pasting failures on Windows resulting in "Uuups" errors.  The common factor is Pieces OS 11.4.2.  Suggested solutions include checking for Pieces OS and plugin updates, disabling L.T.M 2.5, and verifying image format compatibility.

related_issues.title: Failed to connect to PiecesOS
related_issues.text:
Failed to connect to PiecesOS
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.4.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Chrome plugin doesn't work properly. I can't use the buttons and features, and the sidebar cannot establish connection either. Inside of Pieces desktop app it shows that the chrome plugin is outdated. However this is the newest I got from the chrome app store.

Plugin version: 4.0.9
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Pieces Desktop keeps crashing
related_issues.text:
Pieces Desktop keeps crashing
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.4.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I just updated Pieces to try out L.T.M 2.5, and I noticed that the software keeps stopping and restarting on its own. I checked for any updates I may have missed, and none. I restarted the software by forcing it to quit, but the issue persisted. 

The issue only happens when I turn on L.T.M. 
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Pasting images doesn't work.
related_issues.text:
Pasting images doesn't work.
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.4.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I paste an image, and I get after a while the "Uuups..." error response. GPT4.1 one tries to read the contents but fails. So pasting doesn't work.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Investigate Pieces OS 11.4.2 for bugs related to Chrome plugin connection failures, desktop app crashes on macOS with L.T.M 2.5 enabled, and image pasting failures on Windows.
Prioritize resolution of issue #734 (Pieces Desktop keeps crashing) due to high activity level.
Address issue #739 (Failed to connect to PiecesOS) and #738 (Pasting images doesn't work) impacting Windows users.
Check for updates to the Pieces OS Chrome plugin to resolve connection issues.
Advise users experiencing crashes on macOS with L.T.M 2.5 enabled to disable the feature as a temporary workaround.
Investigate image format compatibility issues on Windows related to pasting failures and "Uuups" errors.
Improve error messaging for image pasting failures to provide more specific guidance to users.
Monitor support tickets for new reports related to Pieces OS 11.4.2 and related applications.
Consider adding troubleshooting steps to the FAQ or knowledge base for common issues related to Pieces OS 11.4.2 and connected applications.
Communicate known issues and workarounds to users through official channels (e.g., release notes, blog posts, social media).
